summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Department of Parks and Recreation; authorizing acceptance of a King County grant to support field and lighting improvements at Genesee Playfield; increasing the expenditure allowance of the Department of Parks and Recreation's 2001 Adopted Budget; and making a reimbursable appropriation from the Cumulative Reserve Subfund-Unrestricted Subaccount; all by a three-fourths vote of the City Council.
